subject: SIMSONN Distribution in New Zealand and Australia
description_text: Hi There, I have bought you Haptic Reactors to try and instantly loved them. Is there away we can do business together? I'm pretty keen to try some pedals and other peripherals you have. SAMUEL BENSLEY Director | ARDimporting.co.nz sam@ardimporting.co.nz ardimporting.co.nz

conversations.body_text: Hi Samuel Bensley,   Alright, I will have our sales colleague Jenny get in touch with you.Â
